name: Pick Up Truck
description:
The Pick Up Truck is a versatile favourite that encourages hours of creative play. It comes fully loaded with 2 rounds, but is ready for any big job.

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age.

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each car and transporter will have its own unique personality and charm.

Dimensions: Pick Up Truck - 10” long, by 5” tall, by 4”wide 
                   Rounds - 1.5" tall, by 1.5" round

Age 3 and up

name: Car Transporter Truck with Mini Car
description:
The Car Transporter Truck with its removable car is a versatile favourite that encourages hours of creative play. It is fully compatible with all our Mini Sports or Race Cars, which gives you the option of collecting as many additional cars as you wish.

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age.

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each car and transporter will have its own unique personality and charm.

Dimensions: Pick Up Truck - 10” long by 5” tall by 4”wide, Mini Mini Sports or Race Car – 4” long by 1 ½” tall by 2” wide

Age 3 and up

name: Weaving Loom - Large
description:
This traditionally designed weaving loom is hand made from oak, and finished with natural beeswax to withstand a lifetime of weaving.

Dimensions: 16" tall, 13" wide.

The loom comes complete with instructions on how to set up and get started.

name: Wet Felted Soap Kit - Small
description:
Create your own beautiful felt covered soap – soap and a facecloth all in one. This simple little project makes a wonderful gift and is also a great activity to share with your children. 

Each kit includes:
-Easy to follow instructions.
-One simply divine Organic Shea and Cocoa butter soap (handmade locally by Shea Butter Market).
-Unbleached white Canadian merino 
-Two plant dyed accent colours (hand dyed here at BellaVita Artisan Studios).

Each kit comes in a variety of colours, please select from the options below.

For ages 3 and up. (Younger children will need a little help to get things started)

name: Felting Needles
description:
We are pleased to be able supply these high quality felting needles to supplement your needle felting tool kit.

Sold in either a 2 pack for $2.25 or 4 pack for $4.00.

name: Needle Felting Artist Palette
description:
Create your own beautiful needle felted figures and designs with this complete colour palette of plant dyed local wool fibres, hand dyed here at BellaVita Artisan Studios. 

Each palette includes:
-15 plant dyed local wool accent colours (hand dyed here at BellaVita Artisan Studios).
-Unbleached white Canadian merino wool.

name: Needle Felt Starter Kit
description:
Create your own beautiful needle felted figures and designs with this Needle Felt Starter Kit. Everything you will need to bring your own designs to life is contained in this package. This kit makes a wonderful gift and is also a great activity to share with your children. 

Each kit includes:
-Easy to follow instructions.
-Two felting needles.
-Felting Pad
-Eight plant dyed local wool accent colours (hand dyed here at BellaVita Artisan Studios).
-Unbleached white Canadian merino.

For ages 8 and up.

name: Little Mushroom
description:
This sweet little mushroom complements the Mushroom House Set which is the perfect home for fairies, gnomes and other little woodland creatures.  The mushroom cap is removable, allowing for even more possibilities in imaginative play.

Individually handcrafted from locally harvested kiln dried alder; each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax or oil and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age. 

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each mushroom will have its own unique personality and charm. 

Dimensions: 
Small mushroom cap - approx. 1 ¼” tall by 2 ½” diameter
Small mushroom base - approx. 1 ½” tall by 1 ¼” diameter

name: Felt Rock Kit
description:
Create your own beautiful felt covered rock. This simple little project makes a wonderful gift and is also a great activity to share with your children. 

Each kit includes:
-Easy to follow instructions.
-Unbleached white Canadian merino. 
-Four plant dyed accent colours (hand dyed here at BellaVita Artisan Studios).
-Three locally sourced river rocks! 

Each kit comes in a variety of colours. Please select from the options below.

For ages 3 and up. (Younger children will need a little help to get things started)

name: Table Top Castle - Walnut
description:
This sweet little Walnut Table Top Castle is just the right size for fairies, gnomes and other little friends. Its lovely detail and size makes this castle a wonderful choice for play tables and small spaces. It is also a beautiful piece for a Nature Table or perhaps a play friendly display in an office.

Each set comes in its own handmade 100% cotton bag, tied with a beautiful piece of Aurelia’s hand spun and dyed wool yarn.

Handcrafted from black walnut with locally harvested kiln dried alder towers; each piece is sanded silky smooth, individually finished with oil for a shine which will last a life time. This set is built to last.

Dimensions: Bridge - 3” long by 2” wide by 3/4” high

                       Wall –4” long by 2 ½” high by 3/4” thick

                       Gate –3” wide by 4” high by 1 ½” thick

                       Tower base - 3” tall by approx. 2” in diameter

                       Tower top – 1 ½” tall by 3” square

name: 3 Dimensional Tic Tac Toe - Poplar
description:
This beautiful hand crafted three dimensional game measures 6" square and stands 4.75" high, and looks delightful on any coffee table. 

These individually hand crafted games are made with a Poplar base, with wooden playing pieces available in a range of natural pigment colours to complement the distinctly 'BellaVita' natural Alder wood pieces. 

Allow yourself and family the pleasure of playing with this piece of natural wood art.

Available in yellow, orange, red, green and blue natural pigment colours.

name: Weaving Loom - Medium
description:
This traditionally designed weaving loom is hand made from oak, and finished with natural beeswax to withstand a lifetime of weaving.

Dimensions: 13" tall, 11" wide.

The loom comes complete with instructions on how to set up and get started.

name: Mini Sports Car
description:
A fun way to put a little piece of nature into the hand of your little one, while satisfying their need to zoom. These Mini Sports Cars can really fly.  Each Car has its own unique personality and charm due to organic nature of the wood we use, so you can collect a whole fleet if you should wish.

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each car is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age.

Dimensions: approximately 4” long by 2”wide by 1 ½” tall

name: 3 Dimensional Tic Tac Toe - Walnut
description:
This beautiful hand crafted three dimensional game measures 6" square and stands 4.75" high, and looks delightful on any coffee table. 

These individually hand crafted games are made from a Walnut base, with wooden playing pieces available either as natural or in a range of natural pigment colours to complement the distinctly 'BellaVita' natural Alder wood pieces. 

Allow yourself and family the pleasure of playing with this piece of natural wood art.

Available in yellow, orange, red, green and blue natural pigment colours.

name: Logging Truck - Mini Big Wheel
description:
This truck is ready for many kilometers of service. It carries a cargo of removable logs.

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each truck is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age. 

Dimensions: approximately 5 1/2” long by 2 3/4”wide by 3 ½” tall

name: Logging Truck - Medium
description:
This truck is ready for many kilometers of service. It carries a cargo of 3" long removable logs.

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each truck and its cargo is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age. 

Dimensions: approximately 8” long by 3.5”wide by 4” tall

name: Logging Truck - Large
description:
This truck is ready for many kilometers of service. It carries a cargo of 3.5 inch long removable logs. 

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each truck and its cargo is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age. 

Dimensions: approximately 10” long by 4 1/2”wide by 4 ½” tall

name: Locomotive Train Set (3 Piece Set)
description:
This adorable locomotive train set will delight any train enthusiast, and is available only as a three piece set. 

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age. This set is built to last.

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each train will have its own unique personality and charm.

Dimensions:
Engine - 7” long, 3½” tall, 3½”  wide
Cradle Car- 4½” long, 2½” ” tall, 3½” wide
Tanker - 4½” long, 3½”, 3½” wide

name: Mini Train Set (3 Piece Set)
description:
This mini train set is the smallest in our range, and is available only as a three piece set. 

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age. This set is built to last.

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each train will have its own unique personality and charm.

Dimensions:
Engine - 5” long, 2 ½” tall, 2" wide
Cradle Car- 3½” long, 2” tall, 2½” wide
Tanker - 3½” long, 2½”, 2½” wide

name: Tea Light Holder - Large
description:
Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age.

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each car and transporter will have its own unique personality and charm.

name: Tea Light Holder - Medium
description:
Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age.

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each car and transporter will have its own unique personality and charm.

name: Tea Light Holder - Small
description:
Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age.

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each car and transporter will have its own unique personality and charm.

name: Fork Lift Truck
description:
This large sturdy Forklift is capable of lifting cargo a full 7inches off the ground. It comes loaded with one pallet and four natural log “barrels”. 

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder with oak forks. Each Forklift is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age. 

On request, the forklift can be customized for left handers by putting the crank wheel on the opposite side.

Dimensions: approximately 14” long by 5”wide by 10” tall

name: Under a Toadstool
description:
This unique one of a kind wool sculpture is created entirely by hand using only a single felting needle, clouds of wool fibre, and many hours of love and attention. 
It is imbedded into a piece of local kiln dried alder that is finished with natural beeswax.

Needle felted out of 100% Local Canadian wool, hand dyed with natural plant colour right here at BellaVita Artisan Studios.

Suitable for age 5 and up. Firm enough for gentle play.

7" total height  
3.5" in diameter
Sculptural element is 4" tall

name: Flower Girl
description:
This beautiful one of a kind wool sculpture is created entirely by hand using only a single felting needle, clouds of wool fibre, and many hours of love and attention.

Needle felted out of 100% Local Canadian wool, hand dyed with natural plant colour right here at BellaVita Artisan Studios.

Suitable for age 5 and up. Firm enough for gentle play.

6” tall

name: Fairy Queen
description:
This beautiful one of a kind wool sculpture is created entirely by hand using only a single felting needle, clouds of wool fibre, and many hours of love and attention.

Needle felted out of 100% Local Canadian wool, hand dyed with natural plant colour right here at BellaVita Artisan Studios.

Suitable for age 5 and up. Firm enough for gentle play.

6 1/2” tall

name: The Fairy and the Bee
description:
This one of a kind 3D wool painting is created entirely by hand using a single felting needle, clouds of wool fibre, and many hours of love and attention.
The Fairy and the Bee are sculpted outwards from the surface of the painting. 

Needle felted out of 100% Local Canadian wool, hand dyed with natural plant colour right here at BellaVita Artisan Studios.

Suitable for age 5 and up. 

7" by 7" wool painting 
hangs from an 8" kiln dried branch

name: Mushroom House Set
description:
This sweet Mushroom House Set is the perfect home for fairies, gnomes and other little woodland creatures.  The mushroom caps are removable, allowing for even more possibilities in imaginative play.

Individually handcrafted from locally harvested kiln dried alder; each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax or oil and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age. 

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each mushroom will have its own unique personality and charm. 

Dimensions: 
Large mushroom top – approx. 2 ½” tall by 4 ½” diameter
Large mushroom base - approx. 3 ½” tall by 3 ½” diameter
Small mushroom top - approx. 1 ¼” tall by 2 ½” diameter
Small mushroom base - approx. 1 ½” tall by 1 ¼” diameter

name: Freight Engine Train Set (4 Piece Set)
description:
This deluxe Train Set includes one Freight Engine, one Log Car, one Car Transporter with car and one Caboose. This is the Train set of choice for train enthusiasts and collectors, both big and small.

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age. This train is built to last.

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each train will have its own unique personality and charm.

Dimensions:  
Engine - 9” long by 4 ½” tall by 4” wide, 
Car transporter - 6” long by 3” tall by 4”wide,
Car – 4” long by 1 ½” tall by 2” wide,
Log car- 6” long by 4” tall by 4”wide,
Logs- 5 x 5” long,
Caboose - 6” long by 5”tall by 4” wide

Age 3 and up

name: Castello - Basic Set
description:
This beautiful Castello is sturdy enough for even the most demanding of kings and queens. Its open ended versatile design integrates well with building blocks and other toys to provide hours of creative play. This starter set includes 4 walls, 2 (2pc) towers, 1 gate and 1 bridge. 

Handcrafted from locally harvested kiln dried alder; each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age. This set is built to last.

Dimensions:  Bridge - 6” long by 3” wide by 1 ½” high

                        Wall – 7” long by 4” high by 1 ½” thick

                        Gate –5 ½” wide by 6” high by 1 ½” thick

                       Tower base - 6” tall by approx. 3” in diameter

                       Tower top – 2” tall by 4” square

name: Race Car
description:
A larger version of our Mini Race Car, for when more horsepower is needed. These Race cars can really fly. Each Car has its own unique personality and charm due to organic nature of the wood we use, so you can collect a whole fleet if you should wish.

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each car is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age.

Dimensions: approximately 6” long by 3”wide by 2 ½” tall

name: Caboose
description:
The Caboose is a time honoured classic. It has connectors on both ends so that it can be placed anywhere in the train, which allows the caboose to also serve as a passenger car when needed.

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age.

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each car will have its own unique personality and charm.

 Dimensions: 6” long by 5” tall by 4” wide

Age 3 and up

name: Car Transporter with Car
description:
The Car Transporter with its removable car is a versatile favourite that encourages hours of creative play. It is fully compatible with all our Mini Sports or Race Cars, which gives you the option of collecting as many additional cars as you wish.

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age.

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each car and transporter will have its own unique personality and charm.

Dimensions: Car transporter - 6” long by 3” tall by 4”wide, Mini Mini Sports or Race Car – 4” long by 1 ½” tall by 2” wide

Age 3 and up

name: Cradle Car
description:
The Cradle Car got its name from our daughter who discovered it was the perfect sleeping accommodation for a little doll. It is also great for carrying bean bags, rocks, blocks and other treasures.

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age.

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each car will have its own unique personality and charm.

Dimension: 6” long by 3” tall by 4” wide

Age 3 and up

name: Freight Engine
description:
The Freight Engine is the stuff legends are made of. With 6 wheels this heavy duty locomotive is ready for any challenge. The cabin has been carefully rounded to provide an easy grip for both small and large hands. Many grownups find this one hard to resist.

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age. This engine is built to last.

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each engine will have its own unique personality and charm.

Dimensions: 9” long by 4 ½” tall by 4” wide

Age 3 and up

name: Little Engine that Could
description:
This sturdy Little Engine is the most compact of our locomotives, but it still carries enough punch to pull even the most demanding of cargoes.  The cabin has been carefully rounded to provide an easy grip for small hands.

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age. This engine is built to last.

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each engine will have its own unique personality and charm.

Dimensions:  5 ½” long by 4” tall by 4” wide

Suitable for age 3 and up

name: Little Engine that Could  Train Set (3 Piece Set)
description:
This adorable little Train set includes one Little Engine that Could, one Cradle Car and one Tanker Car. It is a perfect place to start for younger children. 

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age. This set is built to last.

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each Train will have its own unique personality and charm.

Dimensions:
Engine - 5 ½” long by 4” tall by 4” wide
Cradle Car - 6” long by 3” tall by 4” wide
Tanker Car - 6” long by 4 ½” tall by 4” wide
 
Suitable for age 3 and up

name: Log Car
description:
The Log Car includes 5 removable natural logs in a variety of thicknesses, making it great fun to load and unload.

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age.

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each car will have its own unique personality and charm.

Dimensions:
Log car- 6” long by 4” tall by 4”wide
Logs- 5 x  5” long

Age 3 and up

name: Steam Engine
description:
The Steam Engine is the work horse of our fleet. It’s aerodynamic profile and longer body makes it the locomotive of choice for long hauls. The cabin has been carefully rounded to provide an easy grip for small hands.

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age. This engine is built to last.

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each engine will have its own unique personality and charm.

Dimensions : 7” long by 4 ½” tall by 4” wide

Age 3 and up

name: Steam Engine Train Set (3 Piece Set)
description:
This Train Set includes one Steam Engine, one Log Car and one Caboose. An excellent starter set for children who are really on the move.

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age. This train is built to last.

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each train will have its own unique personality and charm.

Dimensions:
Engine - 7” long by 4 ½” tall by 4 wide
Log car- 6” long by 4” tall by 4”wide
Logs- 5 x 5” long
Caboose - 6” long by 5”tall by 4” wide

Age 3 and up

name: Tanker Car
description:
The tanker car is a wonderful addition to any train set. Its simplicity offers many possibilities; perhaps it is transporting milk from a farm or fuel for a gas station. Let your imagination decide.

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age.

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each car will have its own unique personality and charm.

Dimensions: 6” long by 4 ½” tall by 4” wide

Age 3 and up

name: Bridge
description:
This bridge is one of our most versatile pieces.  Through your child’s imagination you will see it become a roof, an arch way, or maybe an overpass for our mini sports cars. Flipped upside down it can also become a slide, a boat, a cradle, a seesaw and so much more.

Individually handcrafted from locally harvested kiln dried alder; each bridge is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age.

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each bridge will have its own unique personality and charm.

(The medium bridge is the size included in the Castello Sets.)

Dimensions:
Small bridge - 3” long by 2” wide by 3/4” high
Medium bridge - 6” long by 3” wide by 1 ½” high
Large bridge- 10”long by 3”wide by 2”high

name: Wet Felted Soap Kit - Large
description:
Create your own beautiful felt covered soaps – soap and a facecloth all in one. This simple little project makes a wonderful gift and is also a great activity to share with your children. 

Each kit includes:
-Easy to follow instructions.
-Two simply divine Organic Shea and Cocoa butter soap (handmade locally by Shea Butter Market).
-Unbleached white Canadian merino 
-Four plant dyed accent colours (hand dyed here at BellaVita Artisan Studios).

Each kit comes in a variety of colours, please select from the options below.

For ages 3 and up. (Younger children will need a little help to get things started)

name: Castello – Deluxe Set
description:
The sky is the limit with this deluxe set. With 13 walls, 4 (2 pc) towers, 2 gates, 2 platforms, and a bridge; this impressive Castello provides enough space for any kingdom to settle in. Its open ended versatile design integrates well with building blocks and other toys to provide hours of creative play. 

The Deluxe Castello Set is also a wonderful choice for early childhood and day care centers.

The Castello pieces are handcrafted from locally harvested kiln dried alder, and the platforms are made from ¼” high quality birch plywood.  Each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age. This set is built to last.

Dimensions:  Bridge - 6” long by 3” wide by 1 ½” high

                        Wall – 7” long by 4” high by 1 ½” thick

                       Gate –5 ½” wide by 6” high by 1 ½” thick

                       Tower base - 6” tall by approx. 3” in diameter

                       Tower top – 2” tall by 4” square

                       Platform – 6 ½” by 6 ½” by ¼” thick

name: Table Top Castle
description:
This sweet little Table Top Castle is just the right size for fairies, gnomes and other little friends. Its lovely detail and size makes this castle a wonderful choice for play tables and small spaces. It is also a beautiful piece for a Nature Table or perhaps a play friendly display in an office.

Each set comes in its own handmade 100% cotton bag, tied with a beautiful piece of Aurelia’s hand spun and dyed wool yarn.

Handcrafted from locally harvested kiln dried alder; each piece is sanded silky smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age. This set is built to last.

Dimensions: Bridge - 3” long by 2” wide by 3/4” high

                        Wall –4” long by 2 ½” high by 3/4” thick

                       Gate –3” wide by 4” high by 1 ½” thick

                       Tower base - 3” tall by approx. 2” in diameter

                       Tower top – 1 ½” tall by 3” square

name: Castello - Expansion Set
description:
This Expansion set, which includes 2 walls and 2 platforms, is an excellent addition to any Castello. These platforms fit with all Castello gates and walls, taking castle building to a whole new level. Create tunnels, stables, houses, lookouts and more.

The walls are handcrafted from locally harvested kiln dried alder, and the platforms are made from ¼” high quality birch plywood. Each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age.

Dimensions:  Wall – 7” long by 4” high by 1 ½” thick

                        Platform – 6 ½” by 6 ½” by ¼” thick

name: Castello - Wall
description:
A castle is only as strong as its walls… and these sturdy walls are built to last for generations of play. 

Handcrafted from locally harvested kiln dried alder; each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age.

Dimensions:  7” long by 4” high by 1 ½” thick

name: Castello - Tower
description:
Every King worth his title knows the importance of watch towers in keeping an eye on his people and lands. This tower is made of two separate pieces, so additional blocks can be added to get an even better view.

Handcrafted from locally harvested kiln dried alder; each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age.

Dimensions: Turret – 2” tall by 4” square

                        Tower – 6 ½” tall by 3" diameter

name: Castello - Gate
description:
This Gate is a wonderful piece to add to your building block collection or to any expanding castle.

Handcrafted from locally harvested kiln dried alder; each piece is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age.

Dimensions:  5 ½” wide by 6” high by 1 ½” thick

name: Footbridge
description:
This footbridge is a truly unique piece of art. And a beautiful addition to any nature table or play scape.

Individually handcrafted from a single piece of locally harvested kiln dried alder; each bridge is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age.

Please note that due to the organic nature of the wood we use, each bridge will have its own unique personality and charm.

Dimensions:

Medium footbridge - 6” long by 3” wide by 3” high
Large footbridge - 10” long by 3”wide by 3 ½” high

name: Mini Race Car
description:
A fun way to put a little piece of nature into the hand of your little one, while satisfying their need to zoom. These Mini Race Cars can really fly.  Each Car has its own unique personality and charm due to organic nature of the wood we use, so you can collect a whole fleet if you should wish.

Individually handmade from locally harvested kiln dried alder. Each car is sanded smooth, finished with natural water based beeswax and then polished to a soft shine that only improves with age.

Dimensions: approximately 4” long by 2”wide by 1 ½” tall
